item.title: Notes on the Paper (NLP): Skip-thought Vectors
item.description: Pre-knowledge Reserve Sentence representation Bag of words representation Sen2Vec/Doc2Vec Some highlights of the paper Instead of using a word to predict its surrounding context, this model encode a sentence to predict the sentences around it. The model depends on having a training corpus of contiguous text. The model treat skip-thoughts in the framework of encoder-decoder models. That is, an encoder maps words to a sentence vector and a decoder is used to generate the surrounding sentences.
